description.brief: Applied knowledge, divine insight, and spiritual awareness
description.detailed: Wisdom represents intuitive understanding, perception of patterns, and spiritual connection. High Wisdom enhances healing, protection, and insight-based abilities.
description.visual_manifestation: Radiant aura, calm focus, cyan halos

primary_effects: Increases healing power and protective effect strength
Improves perception and detection of hidden patterns
Enhances resistance to illusions and mind effects
Boosts communion with divine and spiritual forces
secondary_effects: Improves resource efficiency for support skills
Enables early warning and predictive reads

damage_type_integration.damage_synergy: Lightning and insight-based techniques scale with Wisdom
